title: Log all webhook events, payloads, and delivery outcomes for compliance and troubleshooting
summary: All webhook event activity—including incoming payloads, delivery attempts, and results—must be logged thoroughly to support compliance, auditing, and incident troubleshooting. Logging must be granular enough to reconstruct event flows, trace failures, and demonstrate regulatory adherence.

reasoning.source_summary_fragment: Reliability is ensured via retry with exponential backoff, delivery logs/status (API/dashboard), and notification on persistent failures.

title: Implement rate limiting for high-frequency webhook clients and notify on threshold breaches
summary: Introduce rate limiting controls on webhook endpoints to mitigate abuse and ensure reliability for all users. Clients exceeding configured thresholds must be notified promptly, supporting policy transparency and proactive correction.

reasoning.source_summary_fragment: Edge cases include schema conflicts (reject with detailed errors) and rate limiting for high-frequency clients.

title: Produce and maintain sample payloads, setup guides, and troubleshooting documentation
summary: Comprehensive sample payloads, integration setup guides, and troubleshooting documentation must be maintained and updated. These resources improve usability, aid onboarding, and help clients efficiently address common integration issues.

reasoning.source_summary_fragment: Non-functionals: ... provide usability features like sample payloads, setup docs, and support team training.

title: Train support teams on common webhook integration issues
summary: Support teams must receive training focused on typical webhook integration challenges and troubleshooting techniques. This enables effective assistance to clients, reducing time to resolution and support escalations.

reasoning.source_summary_fragment: Non-functionals: ... provide usability features like ... support team training.

title: Upgrade insurance claims processing system and API to support webhooks
summary: The insurance claims processing system and its API must be updated to integrate webhook event triggers. This foundational upgrade enables asynchronous claim status notifications and seamless downstream integration.

reasoning.source_summary_fragment: Dependencies include upgrades to core claims processing and API.

title: Ensure webhook system scalability for high enterprise event volumes
summary: The webhook system must be architected and tested for scalability, supporting high enterprise event loads without performance degradation. This ensures continued reliability, even under surge conditions or severe loads.

reasoning.source_summary_fragment: Non-functionals: scale for enterprise event volume, maintain compliance...

title: Deliver webhook management UI and backend logic
summary: Develop a user interface and backend logic to provide clients with the tools necessary for configuring, managing, and monitoring webhook registrations. The solution must prioritize usability and seamless integration with existing enterprise systems.

reasoning.source_summary_fragment: Clients must be able to register endpoints, select events, and define custom data fields per integration profile.

title: Supply compliance and monitoring scripts for webhook operations
summary: Provide scripts designed for compliance audits and operational monitoring of webhook infrastructure. These scripts enable regular health checks, anomaly detection, and fulfilment of regulatory requirements.

reasoning.source_summary_fragment: Supply compliance and monitoring scripts for webhook operations.

title: Develop and provide client and support training guides
summary: Create and share comprehensive training guides tailored for both clients and internal support staff, ensuring effective webhook integration, onboarding efficiency, and empowered troubleshooting.

reasoning.source_summary_fragment: Non-functionals: ... provide usability features like sample payloads, setup docs, and support team training.
